roleset.name: dead
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, perish-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls disappearance-48.2.

example.name: arg0
example.text: I bet Soviet Union had no idea they 'd be perished in the late 80s - early 90s .

example.name: with CAU
example.text: Within this period, not less than one million of Cambodian people were perished of starvation, slavery, sickness and other arbitrary executions.
example.arg: not less than one million of Cambodia people
of starvation, slavery, sickness, and other arbitrary executions
